column4: putting vga=791 on /boot/grub/menu.lst I can get a framebuffer resolution 1024x768. But...what about 1200x800?
Naw, it doesn't support wvga sadly. I wish it did.
...hmmm. Why, when I've installed SUSE, I got a splashscreen (during boot time) with a good resolution?
I don't know, I was just trying to get a nice widescreen res on my laptop, it said it wasn't supported (for terminals)
